name: ZumaSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, dim the bathroom light”
”Alexa, set the bedroom light to fifty percent”
”Alexa, make the living room light warmer”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zuma experience
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control brightness and temperature for a natural lighting experience. Simply say 'Alexa, turn on my Zuma' to turn on your lights.

To use this skill you will need one or more Zuma lights and to link this skill with your Zuma account.

Tap enable skill and sign in with your Zuma account. Ask Alexa to 'discover smart home devices' and your lights should available to Alexa.

You can create a new Zuma account at the same time as you link this skill from Alexa.
